tool_description: Checks real-time availability for specific properties during requested dates, returning availability status and current pricing.

property_ids.description: List of property IDs to check availability

error_messages: Invalid property IDs: Provide 1-50 valid property identifier strings.
Invalid date range: Check-in and check-out dates must be valid and in the future.
Invalid guest count: Number of guests must be between 1 and 20.
Invalid room count: Number of rooms must be between 1 and 10.
Properties not found: One or more property IDs could not be located.
usage: Provide property_ids array and check-in/check-out dates, optionally specify guests and rooms. Returns availability status and current pricing for each property.

available_properties.description: Property IDs that are available for the requested dates

unavailable_properties.description: Property IDs that are not available

current_prices.description: Current prices per night for available properties

total_costs.description: Total costs for the entire stay per available property
